Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: I was having bad dreams even before Bralen Carvaren died...
It seems like they started when I got that ash statue.
Maybe if you take the statue away, the dreams will stop.
Maybe I should talk to one of the priests at the Temple.
You know how people have started going crazy in the streets, attacking people for no reason?
You weren't supposed to see 'em, outlander. I can't let you out of here if you've seen 'em.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
mwVelfredtheOutlawREF.SetAV Aggression 100
mwVelfredtheOutlawREF.ModDisposition Player -100
mwVelfredtheOutlawREF.StartCombat Player
mwIlfhildREF.SetAV Aggression 100
mwIlfhildREF.ModDisposition Player -100
mwIlfhildREF.StartCombat Player

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Bring me the statue. Then I may be able to clear Varvur's name for the murder of Bralen Carvaren.
You have the statue? Give it to me and I will see if I can clear Varvur's name for the murder of Bralen Carvaren.
I believe these statues have some kind of corrupting influence.
If you could find out how Varvur Sarethi got the ash statue, I would be grateful.
Galtis Guvron gave Varvur the ash statue? Go talk to Galtis Guvron at the Rat in the Pot and ask him about the ash statue.
Galtis Guvron gave Varvur the ash statue? And Galtis is dead? Did you find anything on his body?
A clue to where the statues are coming from?
You found a note on Galtis Guvron's body when you asked about the ash statues? Let me see... Perhaps this "Hanarai" is Hanarai Assutlanipal.
She claims to be an outcast ashlander. Her house is the first one on the right down the stairs from the Temple.
She may be as unwilling to talk as Galtis. Take these potions in case you need them.
Go to Hanarai Assutlanipal's house here in Ald'ruhn. Use the potions I gave you if you need them.

By killing Hanarai Assutlanipal, the source of these ash statues in Ald'ruhn has been shut down. I admire your achievement, but we must remain vigilant against anyone else who comes to Ald'ruhn with ash statues.
Hanarai Assutlanipal is no longer a threat to Ald'ruhn.
Did Mistress Morvayn ask you to bring me another ash statue? I believe I can remove the corrupting magic from these statues. Bring the statue to me, and I will do what I can.
This ash statue was found in Morvayn Manor? Give it to me, then, and I will destroy it.
I couldn't remember before, but now I know where I got the statue. I got it from Galtis Guvron at The Rat in the Pot.
I'm glad it's all over.
The ash statues are a sign of the Sixth House. But they are not the main front. Destroy Dagoth Ur. Do not get sidetracked by smaller plots.
This ash statue troubles me. I would have you speak with someone at the Temple about this statue.
Perhaps Lloros Sarano would know more of it.
Have you spoken to Lloros Sarano about the ash statue?
I am glad my son is feeling better.
What? No. Where did you...? Damn!

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
SetStage fbmwHRSixthHouseBase 80
SetAV Aggression 100
ModDisposition Player -100
StartCombat Player

Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: You found ash statues on board the ship, dumpling? I knew Velfred was a smuggler, but I had no idea he was involved in... darker things.
A word of advice, my sweet, avoid these ash statues. They can be dangerous and are of little value.
That's a peculiar thing. Never seen anything like it. Let me ask around and see if anyone has seen anything like that before.
I don't know what you're talking about. I don't know anything about any statues.
The statues are troubling, but surely not the concern of an outlander.
These ash statues trouble me, but they are not your concern.
How could you... No, nevermind. I'll just have to take care of this right now.

Result Script.SCTX - Result script source:
SetStage fbmwHRSixthHouseBase 50
SetAV Aggression 100
ModDisposition Player -100
StartCombat Player
